model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Haha, that was a good one! Aren't you glad I pushed you into the cold water?
No, I'm not glad. That was completely uncalled for.
Oh come on, it was just a joke. Lighten up a bit.
It wasn't funny. You shouldn't push people like that, especially into cold water.
Fine, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to upset you. Let's just forget about it.
Okay, but just don't do it again.
I won't. So, do you remember the time when I mowed the lawn with that old push mower?
Yeah, I remember that. That was pretty tough work.
It was. But it was also a good workout.
I prefer to work out indoors where there's air conditioning.
Ha, I remember when I took off my jacket and put my feet up in your armchair. It was so warm that day.
Yeah, that was a hot day. I'm glad you felt comfortable in my home though.
You know, I really enjoy spending time with you. I want to get to know you even better.
I feel the same way. We should plan something fun to do together.
Absolutely. Hey, do you remember when I ripped off the tag from my shirt?
Yeah, your mom was pretty upset about that.
I didn't think it was a big deal, but she sure did. Do you ever have disagreements like that with your parents?
Sometimes, but not often. We have a pretty good relationship.
That's great to hear. I hope I have a good relationship with my kids someday.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Bonding over Chores and Common Interests', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A and B discuss mowing the lawn and potentially working on it together. They also talk about becoming good friends.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: Whew, that was quite a workout. I don't think I'll ever get used to mowing the lawn with that old push mower. ### Neighbors B: I hear you. It's definitely a lot of work, but at least you're getting some exercise out of it. ### Neighbors A: That's true. Plus, it feels good to have a nice looking yard. I remember when we talked about how warm it was in the house a few years ago. It definitely feels hotter outside today. ### Neighbors B: Yeah, I remember that conversation. We should probably make sure to have some extra water on hand for the next time you mow the lawn. ### Neighbors A: That would be great. Maybe next time we can both work on it together and make it a little easier. ### Neighbors B: Sounds good to me. I always enjoy spending time outside, even if it's just doing chores like mowing the lawn. ### Neighbors A: Me too. And who knows, maybe we'll discover even more things we have in common. I'm really glad we've become such good friends over the years. ### Neighbors B: Same here. It's always nice to have good neighbors who you can count on.' }
```
